TEAM NEWS Gerrard returns for @LFC as do Manquillo & Lallana, in for Enrique, Allen & Coutinho while @OfficialFOXES are unchanged #LEILIV
TEAM NEWS James Wilson and Ander Herrera replace Wayne Rooney and Angel Di Maria for @ManUtd's match against @stokecity #MUNSTK
TEAM NEWS Three changes for @stokecity as Ireland, Assaidi and Bardsley replace Sidwell, Walters and Arnautovic #MUNSTK
TEAM NEWS Three changes for @stokecity as Ireland, Assaidi and Bardsley replace Sidwell, Walters and Arnautovic #MUNSTK
TEAM NEWS @BurnleyOfficial bring in Arfield for Kightly; Abeid & Cisse start for @NUFC, replacing Colback & Sissoko #BURNEW
TEAM NEWS Benteke returns for @AVFCOfficial coming in for Sanchez as @CPFC replace Ledey and Zaha with Puncheon & McArthur #CRYAVL
The teams are in - & #FPL managers, you still have till 1930 GMT to pick your XI! Head to http://t.co/mL6dIqG04V for all the latest...
TEAM NEWS 3 changes to the @whufc_official team to face @WBAFCofficial as Reid, Nolan & Zarate come in for Collins, Noble & Jarvis #WBAWHU
TEAM NEWS @SwansOfficial bring in Richards and Britton in place of Rangel and Shelvey; @QPRFC recall Dunne at the expense of Isla #SWAQPR
Marouane Fellaini: "We have to continue the way we did against Hull. But Stoke have a physical presence so we have to be ready" #MUNSTK
KICK-OFF The four 1945 GMT kick-offs are under way. Where will we see December's first #BPL goal? http://t.co/XrMVsa1rKY
KICK-OFF And we're now under way at Selhurst Park and The Hawthorns in the two 8pm matches #CRYAVL #WBAWHU http://t.co/IP54Tx1XHX
PHOTO No goals in the first 17 mins at the Liberty Stadium but there have been good chances at both ends #SWAQPR http://t.co/nnyZ3D7mwQ
GOAL Man Utd 1-0 Stoke (21 mins). @fellainiM gallops into the box to meet Juan Mata's cross at the back post with a powerful header #MUNSTK
GOAL Leicester 1-0 Liverpool ( 21 mins) Leonardo Ulloa's shot comes back off the post, hits Mignolet and goes in #LEILIV
GOAL West Brom 1-0 West Ham (10 mins). Dawson heads in from six yards, meeting Dorrans' whipped free-kick #WBAWHU
GOAL Leicester 1-1 Liverpool (26 mins) Adam Lallana drives in the equaliser after Gerrard's free-kick was cleared #LEILIV
GOAL Burnley 1-0 Newcastle (34 mins). George Boyd smashes into the net from 20 yards after Danny Ings' knockdown #BURNEW
GOAL Man Utd 1-1 Stoke (39 mins) Steven Nzonzi powers in from long range to level it up at Old Trafford #MUNSTK
PHOTO Craig Dawson's 10th-minute header still separates West Brom and West Ham after 26 mins at The Hawthorns #WBAWHU http://t.co/4W0pvcFafA
PHOTO Leonardo Ulloa celebrates @OfficialFOXES's opener. It's now Leicester 1-1 Liverpool (44 mins) #LEILIV http://t.co/oYUwbTH8Xu
GOAL Palace 0-1 Villa (32 mins) Christian Benteke wins the ball on the left & goes on a driving run before slotting past Speroni #CRYAVL

HALF-TIME #BPL SCORES 
Swansea 0-0 QPR
Man Utd 1-1 Stoke
Leicester 1-1 Livepool
Burnley 1-0 Newcastle
GOAL West Brom 1-1 West Ham (35 mins). Nolan nods in from close range following Foster's great save from Carroll's overhead kick #WBAWHU
PHOTO George Boyd's sensational second goal of the season sent Burnley into half-time leading Newcastle 1-0 #BURNEW http://t.co/zGaKkWMgdh
GOAL West Brom 1-2 West Ham (45+3 mins). James Tomkins rises highest to meet a corner and give his team the lead #WBAWHU
ASSIST Stewart Downing sent in the corner for Tomkins to head West Ham in front against West Brom just before half-time #WBAWHU
GOAL Burnley 1-1 Newcastle (48 mins) Papiss Cisse turns the ball home from 6 yards to draw the Magpies level #BURNEW
It's still Swansea 0-0 QPR, but here's how close Sigurdsson's free-kick was before Green clawed it out #SWAQPR http://t.co/0jNX3TuOnO
GOAL Leicester 1-2 Liverpool (54 mins) Gerrard arrives late in the box to steer into the corner after Leicester fail to clear #LEILIV
GOAL Man Utd 2-1 Stoke (59 mins) Juan Mata's curling free-kick from the right evades everyone and ends up in the far corner #MUNSTK
PHOTO Christian Benteke celebrates his first #BPL goal since March 23 #CRYAVL http://t.co/2LTpGSoCuk
RED CARD Leicester skipper Wes Morgan is sent off for hauling down Rickie Lambert. Leicester 1-2 Liverpool (63 mins) #LEILIV
PHOTO Back in the team & back on the scoresheet, Gerrard has put @LFC ahead. It's Leicester 1-2 Liverpool #LEILIV http://t.co/XZHCbx21yX
PHOTO Mata's inswinging free-kick put Man Utd back in front. They still lead Stoke with 20 mins to play #MUNSTK http://t.co/JDwijwPMZY
GOAL Swansea 2-0 QPR (83 mins) Routledge places into the bottom corner from the edge of the box after being teed up by Dyer #SWAQPR
GOAL Leicester 1-3 Liverpool (88 mins) Jordan Henderson slots in from Sterling's backheel after Schmeichel spilled the ball #LEILIV
FULL-TIME Swansea 2-0 QPR. The hosts score twice in the last 12 mins to move up to 6th #SWAQPR http://t.co/vPp9lUH6KB
FULL-TIME Man Utd 2-1 Stoke. Marouane Fellaini and Juan Mata make it four #BPL wins in a row for @ManUtd #MUNSTK http://t.co/HJ6DEsiQ35
FULL-TIME Burnley 1-1 Newcastle. Cisse salvages a point for Newcastle but Burnley climb out of the bottom 3 #BURNEW http://t.co/JXDnc8bFI4
FULL-TIME Leicester 1-3 Liverpool. Gerrard's goal helps the Reds recover to beat 10-man Leicester #LEILIV http://t.co/gx28mMZDhz
FULL-TIME Palace 0-1 Villa. Christian Benteke returns to fire Villa to their first #BPL win in 10 matches #CRYAVL http://t.co/ak4v22RRoK
FULL-TIME West Brom 1-2 West Ham. The Hammers come from behind to win for the second time in four days #WBAWHU http://t.co/PxjiTwtevS

Back-to-back wins for @LFC, will they make the top four?

Paul Lambert: "@bentekechris20 is not the finished article by any stretch, but if he keeps progressing he can be one of the best." #CRYAVL

SUB @OfficialFOXES make a second change - Jamie Vardy makes way for Chris Wood on 66 mins. Villa 1-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
GOAL Aston Villa 2-1 Leicester (71 mins). Alan Hutton chests down Benteke's pass and smashes home from close range #AVLLEI
SUB @AVFCOfficial make their final change on 76 mins as Bacuna comes on for N'Zogbia. Villa 2-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
SUB Marc Albrighton replaces Schlupp in the final change of the match for @OfficialFOXES. Villa 2-1 Leicester (78 mins) #AVLLEI
RED CARD Paul Konchesky is dismissed for Leicester after an altercation with Alan Hutton on 80 mins. Villa 2-1 Leicester #AVLLEI
FULL-TIME Villa 2-1 Leicester. Alan Hutton's first #BPL goal for 4 years earns @AVFCOfficial all 3 points #AVLLEI http://t.co/LeZo3ZpT9y
